thread.title: `Ailing` Lamar Odom`s kids thank fans for support, prayers
thread.title_full: `Ailing` Lamar Odom`s kids thank fans for support, prayers - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: `Ailing` Lamar Odom`s kids thank fans for support, prayers
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct. 16 (ANI): Lamar Odom 's children recently showed their gratitude to the former NBA star's fans for supporting and praying for him during his critical condition.*
Washington D.C., Oct. 16 (ANI): Lamar Odom's children recently showed their gratitude to the former NBA star's fans for supporting and praying for him during his critical condition. The 34-year-old basketball champ's kids Destiny Odom, 17, and Lamar Odom Jr., 13, who have been by their ailing father's side at Sunrise Hospital in Nevada, released a statement on the behalf of their family, reports E! Online. The statement read, "Thanks for your outpouring of prayers and support for our dad. We are here with our family and friends; we appreciate everyone respecting our privacy at this time. We ask for your continued prayers." Hospital sources have revealed that Odom's condition is still the same and everyone is praying for a miracle. (ANI) Â»
